no_United+States+Sustainable+Development.answer: Goal scores are calculated by averaging goal scores for each indicator. Growth rates are measured using the linear average growth rate for the period closest to 2015-2020.

no_United+States+Sustainable+Development.question: What is the process for determining progress towards the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and calculating their scores?

SDG scores are calculated starting from 2015 (or the closest year for which there is data) up to 2020 (or the last year for which there is data). The linear average growth rate is used to measure growth rates for the period closest to 2015-2020.
